resources.string: QASSA is an AOSP/PE+ based Rom with customizations
Maintains for Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro (Joyeuse)
Maintains for Xiaomi Redmi Note 5 Pro (Whyred)
Press on color below to apply
Use proper app icons for notification icons in statusbar
Replace clear all text with OOS clear all button
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
Display the number of pending notifications
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup
Spoof your device as different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Spoof your device as different model for Netflix
Spoof your device as different model for Google Play Integrity
Use old style mobile data icons
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Whether to show R style notification headers
Whether to Center R style notification headers
Play sound when screenshot is taken
Show blur behind in quick settings
Blurs the darkened background behind quick settings
Set radius of blur behind QS panel
Whether to Right R style notification headers
Always display battery percentage when charging
Show lightning \u26A1\uFE0E symbol when charging (Only for hidden & icon landscape capsule)
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Hide VoLTE when VoWiFi is available. This also overrides old style signal icon for VoWiFi.
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display the cross sign next to signal icon when data is disabled
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide and display clock for regular interval to save statusbar space
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display clock in quick status bar header
Amount of time you need to hold power and volume buttons to take screenshot
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications

This removes the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Normally, special applications are replaced with black areas in records. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. After changing this toggle, you may need to restart applications for the change to take effect
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Display icon of activity that generates toast message
Show up and down icons on mobile and wifi icons when data is used
Enable the running services icon in the footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Disable auto brightness when entering game mode
Display the notification content in the form of danmaku in the game
Choose the application that you want to launch with a floating ball
Adjust performance level when starting game
Do not allow floating notification and conversation bubbles other than incoming calls and alarms
Turn off the ringing of incoming calls and notifications in gaming mode
Answer calls automatically in the game and hands free when no headphones connected
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Automatically filter notifications such as download progress
Show menu overlay when game is running. If this option is disabled, some game mode features will be disabled, such as Danmaku notifications
Show app volume in volume panel.
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Double-tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put device asleep
Display status bar on the lockscreen
Allow accessing quick settings on secure lockscreen
Allow power menu action only after authentication
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Display rotation button on navigation bar when available
Enable and configure the traffic indicators
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Place indicator in either status bar or expanded header
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app
disable scrim view in quick settings
The privacy indicators icons also appears on the statusbar
Show on QS when an app is using the Microphone or Location also Camera
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk. (Device should be rooted for this to work)
Restore the above set sepolicy mode on each boot
Action failed because of missing superuser access
Animate lightning \u26A1\uFE0E symbol when charging (only for circle battery)
Each battery level drop is color coded (only for circle battery)
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
This allows you to downgrade applications. Note that this may lead to crashes and data corruption.
Block ads with a modified hosts file. Turn off to use third party solutions or if apps cause issues.
Display advanced restart options on secured lockscreen
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Show a dialog when an application crashes
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Spoof storage encryption status to encrypted.
Increase the number of icons in QQS (requires SystemUI restart)
Max. notification icons visible on statusbar
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Misc Signal and Wifi Icon Settings
customize statusbar signal wifi icon settings
Stop all non-essential background processes when the device is idle
